title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-4.173 - Ventilation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-4.173 - Ventilation

State Regulations

Enclosed mobile food service establishments and pushcarts are to be provided with sufficient ventilation to keep them free of excessive heat, steam, condensation, vapors, odors, smoke and fumes. Ventilation systems are not to create an unsightly or harmful discharge or create a nuisance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
14-4.173

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
